rev.desc.rev.desc: Upgrade Utility detects actived languages more accurately
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade SM9.3x and 9.4x non-pd to SM9.50 Hybrid
After upgrade PT should be PT-BR
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
change the sql to add pd.enabled condition to query upginfo
panel:start
panel:start
Change $L.sql from using $L.version to true
only active languages will be listed in upgrade language selection panel
correct status setting problem when the status is START.
correct status setting problem when the status is fixing or transfering.
when perform status reading, the dbdict:upginfo may do not exist. add if statements to correct this issue.
QCCR1E62819 [Upgrade] Missing 2 languages when apply upgrade on SM
QCCR1E62023 [Upgrade] Language selection panel should default to true only the active languages
save upgrade package path in load transfer
Modification for CenterPoint Request 32254 Task 29705.

Modification made to populate the lang.selected array of structures in the upgradestatus record. This will be displayed by the upgrade to give the user the capability to select which languages are to be upgraded during the upgrade.
To effect this change, the following panels were modified:
setup.status
. Added code to populate the lang.selecte array of structures in the upgradestatus record from the information in the upginfo array AND other pertinent information in the language file.

Modification for CenterPoint Request 32254 Task 29705.

Modification made to populate the lang.selected array of structures in the upgradestatus record. This will be displayed by the upgrade to give the user the capability to select which languages are to be upgraded during the upgrade.
To effect this change, the following panels were modified:
setup.status
. Added code to populate the lang.selecte array of structures in the upgradestatus record from the information in the upginfo array AND other pertinent information in the language file.
